fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Uraku Misugiri__
Best 5-star for Albedo's damage.
__Cinnabar Spindle__
Best in slot 4-star made for Albedo, however is from a old event.
__Wolf Fang__
Performs worse than Cinnabar Spindle.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Harbinger of Dawn__
Good option, provided you can maintain its passive.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF% |<goblet>  Geo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
**2)** Elemental Burst: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
**3)** Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Weiss

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: If using __Cinnabar Spindle__ use __Golden Troupe__. If you using __Wolf Fang__ build __Husk of Opulent Dreams__.
